item.description:
Location: Mandarin Oriental Hotel, 776 Boylston Street Boston, MA

Each year the Boston Business Development conference attracts over 250 business development leaders of biotechnology and pharmaceutical companies. Next year it will be held on April 12, 2011 at the Madarin Oriental Hotel and speakers include business development executives from GlaxoSmithKline, Pfizer, Merck, Novartis, Roche, Shire, Genentech, Genzyme, Biogen, Vertex, Alnylam, and Infinity.

For more information and to register, visit http://www.bbbiotechc....
item.name: Boston Business Development Conference
